alert.note: Alert for Coastal Del Norte; Northern Humboldt Coast; Southwestern Humboldt; Southwestern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued November 02 at 8:14PM PDT until November 03 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected. * WHERE...Coastal Del Norte, Northern Humboldt Coast, Southwestern Humboldt and Southwestern Mendocino Interior Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Provide adequate shelter for outdoor pets or consider bringing them indoors. Frost Advisories and Freeze Warnings are issued during the local growing season as defined by climatology and local agriculture experts. Once the growing season has ended these statements will no longer be issued until the spring.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Del Norte; Northern Humboldt Coast; Southwestern Humboldt; Southwestern Mendocino Interior
